page.title: 02HAMWORTHY
page.content: {Hamworthy {Blandford Road}is the large main road and contains a{small shopping {centre. }We found two blocks of shops, containing a Co-op, a Spar food shop and a post office and other small shops. There were more small shops along other minor roads. There were petrol filling stations, a bank and a library along Blandford Road. There are several{schools,}such as Hamworthy First, Hamworthy Middle and Herbert Carter which is a secondary school. Children from this area also go to the grammar schools in Poole. This is a mostly{residential area with narrow roads. The houses are quite old and the gardens are small. There are some rest homes for the elderly. There is some light {industry,}such as boatyards and small factories.
